font.p: The equation [mathjaxinline]Ax = v[/mathjaxinline] has a solution if and only if [mathjaxinline]v[/mathjaxinline] is in the span of the columns of [mathjaxinline]A[/mathjaxinline]. The span of the columns of [mathjaxinline]A[/mathjaxinline] might not be all of [mathjaxinline]\mathbb R^ m[/mathjaxinline], but it is a subspace of [mathjaxinline]\mathbb R^ m[/mathjaxinline].
